mapper.insert: insert into TB_USER(user_id, user_password , name, phone, email, tax_agent_email, rrn) VALUES(#{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{name}, #{phone}, concat(#{emailId},#{domain}), concat(#{taxAgentEmailId},#{taxAgentDomain}), concat(#{fRrn},#{bRrn}))

INSERT INTO TB_BUSINESS(business_no, store_name, zipCode, addr_road, addr_jibun, addr_detail, user_id) VALUES(#{businessNo}, #{storeName}, #{zipCode}, #{addrRoad}, #{addrJibun}, #{addrDetail}, #{userId})
